question: Pedro Sanchez was sworn in as the Prime minister of __________.
explanation: Pedro Sanchez was sworn in as Spain's Prime Minister. Pedro Sanchez has taken charge as seventh head of government of Spain since it returned to democracy in the late 1970s. Pedro Sanchez has replaced Mariano Rajoy. Mariano Rajoy was stepped down due to a corruption scandal. Pedro Sanchez was sworn in as Spanish prime minister before King Felipe. He belongs to the Socialist Party.
